mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(*) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE MAX(ID) END + 1 FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_FUND_NOTIFICATION

SELECT PP.POLICY_NO AS policyNo ,PP.INVT_NO AS invtNo ,PP.INVT_NAME AS invtName ,PP.INVT_RISK_BENE_LEVEL AS invtRiskBeneLevel ,PP.SAFP_NET_AMT as safpNetAmt ,PP.SAFP_NET_UNITS AS safpNetUnits ,PP.SAFP_AVG_PNTDVAL AS safpAvgPntdval ,PP.NET_VALUE_SELL AS netValueSell ,PP.NET_VALUE_DATE AS netValueDate ,PP.EXCH_RATE_BUY AS exchRateBuy ,PP.EXCH_RATE_DATE AS exchRateDate ,PP.CLUP_EXPE_NTD_SUM AS clupExpeNtdSum ,PP.INVT_EXCH_CURR AS invtExchCurr ,( SELECT P.CURRENCY FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY P WHERE P.POLICY_NO = PP.POLICY_NO ) AS insuCurr ,( SELECT a.PARAMETER_NAME FROM ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER a ,ESERVICE_ADM.DBO.PARAMETER_CATEGORY b WHERE a.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID = b.PARAMETER_CATEGORY_ID AND a.SYSTEM_ID = b.SYSTEM_ID AND a.STATUS = b.STATUS AND b.STATUS = 1 AND b.SYSTEM_ID = AND b.CATEGORY_CODE = AND a.PARAMETER_CODE = PP.INVT_EXCH_CURR ) AS currency , R.PERCENTAGE_UP percentageUp , R.PERCENTAGE_DOWN percentageDown FROM ESERVICE.DBO.POLICY_PORTFOLIO PP LEFT JOIN ( SELECT POLICY_NO, PERCENTAGE_UP, PERCENTAGE_DOWN, FUND_CODE FROM (SELECT TOP 1 * FROM ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS WHERE STATUS = '2' AND TRANS_TYPE = 'FUND_NOTIFICATION' ORDER BY TRANS_NUM DESC) T INNER JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_POLICY TP ON T.TRANS_NUM = TP.TRANS_NUM INNER JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_FUND_NOTIFICATION TFN ON TFN.TRANS_NUM = TP.TRANS_NUM INNER JOIN ESERVICE.DBO.TRANS_FUND_NOTIFICATION_DTL TFD ON TFN.ID = TFD.TRANS_FUND_NOTIFICATION_ID ) R ON R.POLICY_NO = PP.POLICY_NO AND PP.INVT_NO = R.FUND_CODE WHERE PP.POLICY_NO = #{policyNo}
SELECT TOP 1 FUND_NAME FROM ESERVICE.DBO.FUND WHERE PRODUCT_NO = SUBSTRING(#{policyNo}, 1, 2) AND FUND_CODE = #{fundCode}
